definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: And slowly the kind man comes closer loses his rage sits down at table.
sentences.chinese: 那個和藹的男人走近了，熄滅怒火在桌子旁坐下來。

sentences.english: He vacillates from agile, amiable, and arch to repetitive and awkward.
sentences.chinese: 他搖擺不定的敏捷，和藹可親，並拱重複和尷尬。

sentences.english: Piscean tends to be generally good-natured and very kind and loving.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座更傾向於和藹，友好而鍾情。

sentences.english: A best commendatory letter request that you have a good attitude.
sentences.chinese: 和藹可親的態度是最好的推薦信。

sentences.english: Lisette gave him a kindly look.
sentences.chinese: 莉莎特和藹地看了他一眼。

sentences.english: She was kind, intelligent and loveable , like Susan.
sentences.chinese: 她和蘇珊一樣很和藹，聰明，可愛。

sentences.english: D. Friendliness is a defining characteristic of affability.
sentences.chinese: 友善是和藹的必然特徵。

sentences.english: You are the most genial person I know.
sentences.chinese: 你是我認識的最和藹可親的人。

sentences.english: He kept chopping about from kindness to cruelty towards his pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他對學生們忽而和藹可親，忽而冷酷無情。

sentences.english: He is a tall man with thick glasses, and he is friendly to students.
sentences.chinese: 他身材高大，戴着高度近視眼鏡，待人和藹。

sentences.english: He had an affable and haughty air, and a mouth which was always smiling, since it did not shut.
sentences.chinese: 他的態度和藹而高傲，有一張合不攏的嘴，老在笑。

sentences.english: She parted from her young friend in the kindliest tones.
sentences.chinese: 她用最和藹可親的語調和她的年輕的朋友道了別。

sentences.english: I enquired at the porters' lodge. A middle-aged man with a kindly face came forward.
sentences.chinese: 我到門房去打聽，一位和藹善良的中年人走上前來。

sentences.english: 'You shall have some, Pip, 'said Joe kindly.
sentences.chinese: “你也會有一份肉餅，匹普，”喬和藹地說。

sentences.english: In the flesh, however, he's more like an amiable professor.
sentences.chinese: 然而他本人看上去更像一個和藹的大學教授。

sentences.english: The human affairs of the company and downstage, simpatico to the person.
sentences.chinese: 公司的人事和前臺，都對人和藹可親。

definition: to be dedicated to one's work/to respect one's work
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
